price: Ã'a, Na jiyar da waɗannan mutãne dãɗi sũ da ubanninsu har gaskiya, da Manzo mai bayyanawar gaskiyar, ya zo musu.
arabic: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡتُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَرَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: bal mattaʿtu hāulāi waābāahum ḥattā jāahumu al-ḥaqu warasūlun mubīnun
